full_content:
--- title: Productivity & Activity Capture --- # Welcome to Revenue Grid Email Integration Component Documentation  
    Revenue Grid is the email-CRM integration component of our premium [revenue intelligence](https://revenuegrid.com/blog/what-is-guided-selling/) package Revenue Grid.   **Productivity and Activity Capture part of the Knowledge Base has the following sections:**

Overview contains Privacy and Security Policy, general product functions and their comparison, and supported environments.

Setup contains step-by-step guides on installing and running the product on different platforms and environments.

Get started includes introductory overviews of the key RG Email Sidebar features and its user interactions and interfaces.

Using the Product section contains practical use guides and articles providing in-detail descriptions of various nuances of product functioning.

User settings include Connectivity, Customization, Synchronization, and other settings available to users having corresponding permissions.

Admin guide contains detailed Administrator's guides on product deployment and fine-tuning, as well as user management.

Troubleshooting section contains step-by-step solutions to known issues which may occur with RGES running in different system configurations.

Email Sidebar Release Notes and updates; information on the latest product updates: new features, improvements, notable bugfixes, and Knowledge Base articles updates.

Email Sidebar FAQs RG Email Sidebar Frequently Asked Questions; section contains popular user inquiries about the Solution and gets updated regularly.

Each article is marked with icons:
to indicate whether its content concerns RG Email Sidebar implementation for [Office 365 mailboxes](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/outlook/email-and-calendar-software-microsoft-outlook), [MS Exchange mailboxes](articles/Introduction/), or the [Chrome Extension](articles/Using-SmartCloud-Connect-for-Salesforce-and-Gmail/) for Gmail / Google Workspace (G Suite), either two, or all of them. **NB:** for readability considerations, in Knowledge Base articles RG Email Sidebar is referred to as *RGES*.

***Copyright © 2005-2023 Revenue Grid. All Rights Reserved Worldwide. All other company and product names in the Knowledge Base are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders.***
